creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
inscribed:
in graphite, upper center and right: sun behind + on the left | notch in the White Mountains from above | with the Notch House
in graphite, throughout: [notations]

titles.title: Notch in the White Mountains from above / with the Notch House [Crawford Notch].

texts.textentryhtml: Bought from Mrs. Florence Cole Vincent, Cole's granddaughter at his Catskill studio
